name: Perfect Weld
overview:
Incepted in the year 2002, “Perfect Weld System” has established itself as one of the prominent manufacturers and suppliers of an extensive array of Thyristor Controllers, Industrial Welding Sets and associated industrial products. Our comprehensive range of products includes Thyristor Control, Aluminum Welding Set, Mig Welding Set, Tig Welding Set, Arc Welding Rectifier, Cutting Sets, Plasma Cutting Set, and Inverter Controllers.

Our Team: Engineers Quality analysts Skilled and unskilled professionals Packaging and delivery personnel

Infrastructure Unit: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure that acts as our backbone in making timely delivery of the products. It consists of various units including high-tech manufacturing unit, quality testing wing and warehousing facility. All these units are equipped with requisite machinery and devices to ensure a break-free operation.

Our Quality: Quality has been always been our first focus when it comes to developing a product line. To ensure that our clients get a flawless and high performing range of industrial products, we have established a dedicated quality department.

Client Satisfaction: It is because of our client-centric approach that we have garnered such a respect and reputation in the market. Our success in ensuring complete client satisfaction is evident from the fact that almost all our clients appreciate us with kind words and repeated orders.

Why Us?: Over the years, we are able to become the foremost choice of the clients due to quality standards of our products and services. Our efficient workforce helps us deliver products and services to the clients as per their precise needs and demands. Further, we ensure that all the ordered products are delivered to the clients within the committed time frame.
